title: Handmade Craft #67fc53
description: ✨ Beautiful handmade craft! This looks like it was made with care and tradition. Price band: ₹250-400 #handmade #craft #artisan

title: Handmade Craft #e53161
description:
Oh, the *kumhar* (potter)'s gentle hands shaping the clay!  It reminds me of my childhood, the earthy *khushboo* (fragrance) of the wet soil, the rhythmic spin of the wheel. Such *kaam* (work) is a testament to our heritage.  Each pot holds stories, memories, and the soul of the artisan.  It’s a piece of India's heart, a living tradition.

Hindi: kumhar (potter), khushboo (fragrance), kaam (work).

Price: ₹200-400

Tags: #HandmadePottery #IndianCrafts #SupportArtisans #ClayPottery #TraditionalCraft
